QuestData.Title: The Headhunter's Harvest
QuestData.Description:
Hey der mon, I be ya new headhunter. The tavern be a perfect place for adventurers to rest after a long journey. It also be a great place to talk them into joining our cause.
I be havin' a few recruits for ya to look at, if ya find one we can hire then I'll give ya a little somethin' as a finder fee for ya time.
QuestData.LogDescription: Recruit a follower from Akanja in the Frostwall Tavern.
